Subject: Invitation to be the Rapid‑Fire Guest on TechTalk

Hi Jordan,

I’m Alex, host of the TechTalk podcast where we dive deep into the latest tech trends – but we keep it snappy. Our listeners love quick, high‑impact insights, and I think your knack for delivering sharp 30‑second soundbites would be a perfect fit for our upcoming “Rapid‑Fire Tech Trends” episode.

We’d love to have you share your perspective on three hot topics – AI ethics, emerging quantum applications, and the biggest startup fundraising trends of 2024 – each in under two minutes.

Would you be available for a 30‑minute recording next week? Let me know what works for you, and I’ll take care of the scheduling.

Looking forward to the possibility of having you on the show!

Best,
Alex
TechTalk Podcast
alex@techtalkpod.com

✅ **Top Recommendation:** Jordan Lee (TechCrunch) – 92% suitability for a rapid‑fire interview.

🎤 **Short Intro Script** (you can use at the start of the episode):

"Welcome back to TechTalk! I’m Alex, and today we’ve got a very special guest, Jordan Lee from TechCrunch. Jordan is famous for delivering the sharpest, most insightful tech soundbites in under 30 seconds. We’re doing a rapid‑fire round where we’ll hit three hot topics – AI ethics, quantum breakthroughs, and startup fundraising – and Jordan will give us the key takeaways in just a couple of minutes each. Let’s dive in!"

📧 **Email Pitch:** (see the email above) – you can copy‑paste it directly to Jordan Lee.
